A Mercenary Company based in the Gahar Valley & Kuduk Valley. Quite commonly hired out by the Merchants making their way along the Silk Road. They have little-to-no naval presence, instead working aboard Merchant vessels. Their symbol is a serpent in the royal colours of House Gahara, while the serpent represents Daniyal.

![](data:image/png;base64,)

"By Daniyal's Wisdom."

# Overview

- The Scarlet Legion primarily seeks financial gain & a chance to flex their muscle.
- This is achieved by taking on Contracts from other Guild Houses & Factions, Settlements, and sometimes individuals.
- Their communication is fairly open, though constrained to customer-and-mercenaries.
- The Scarlet Legion operates on a rank-based system, with a number of convening Marshals at the top.

# Main Purposes & Goals

- Gain Capital
- Increase Mercenary Military Structure
- Gather Capable Warriors
- Fight.

# Leadership & Membership

- Seven Marshals conduct themselves in the Kudak Union, each of them responsible for raising large armies in times of emergency.

- In other Gaharan Nations, there are other Spahbod. Though their responsibilities may be deputised depending on the size of the Nation. Varmanstan, for example, has a number of Marshal-Deputies.

- Members are often capable warriors, with many a supporting staff. Those on the front lines must be capable martial warriors, while the backline can be a mixture of martials, spellcasters. Support staff are often scribes, healers and so on. (Level 5+, CR5+)
- The Scarlet Legion's ranks are as follows.

![[Scarlet Legion Ranks.webp]]

| Rank             | Summary                                                                    |
| ---------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Eran Spahbod.    | Abbas, Commands All Others. Commander In Chief                             |
| Spahbod.         | Equivalent to a Marshal. Manages Forces In Nations. Watches Over Sataptis. |
| Commander.       | Manages County Assignments. Can manage Healers.                            |
| Force-Commander. | Commands Force-Captains & Larger Operations. Can manage Healers.           |
| Force-Captain.   | Commands Operations.                                                       |
| Captain.         | Commands Settlement Forces.                                                |
| Company.         | Forces in a Settlement. Or on Assignment.                                  |

| Rank                     | Summary                                                              |
| ------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Eran Spahbod.            | Abbas, Commands All Others. Commander In Chief                       |
| Communications Officer   | Manages Civilian & Military Communications. They work at all levels. |
| Communications Operators | Manages Communications Between Military & Civillian Staff            |
| Civilian Co-Ordinator    | Manages Healers, Scribes & other Civillian personnel                 |
| Healers                  | Responsible for healing people.                                      |
| Scribes                  | Responsible for information gathering.                               |

- Additional staff, such as Spellblades, can exist outside the traditional structure and support varying staff. These also includes Clerics, Paladins and other notable individuals such as Immortals.

# Locations

The Scarlet Legion operates out of capital cities on the larger scale, organising forces from there. Smaller settlements may hire Legionnaires, in which case they will operate from the best appropriate structure. Barns, Taverns, Townhouses and so on.

# Publicity & Reputation

They have an upstanding reputation with the public, and the various noble houses appreciate their efforts with, or without, contracts. Settlements appreciate their easy-to-negotiate-with prices. Though many prefer adventurer's guilds for short-term opportunities.
